词汇：28个  
句子：56个  
拼读：2个
绘本：2个
__EMPTY:
词汇：
family、sister、little sister、brother、big brother、friend 等

句式： 
There are five people in my family. 

—Do you have any sisters? 
—Yes, I do.

He is my big brother.
Do you have any borthers?

They like to play together.
My best friend is Anna.

He is my cousin.
It's Aunt Claire.
